code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     // set splunk to use mocked connection factory     SplunkComponent splunk = context.getComponent("splunk", SplunkComponent.class).     DefaultSplunkConfigurationFactory cf = Helper.mockComponent(service, socket).     splunk.setSplunkConfigurationFactory(cf).     return context. }
